skills.name: SAVAGE SCYTHE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• 25% Chance to inflict Heal Block on the target for 1 turn.

skills.name: AWAKENED EARTH
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from all allies.
• Heal all allies based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: NATURE'S WILL
desc: Remove Silver Effects from up to 2 allies at the start of battle and grant Cleanse status to all allies for 1 turn.
